data.message: Dear Facebook,                                                                                                                                    Can you please make a flag cover for Kenya?                                                       Sincerely, Evelyn

replies.message: We appreciate your feedback, Evelyn. We've learned a lot from this launch. We're continuing to explore how we can help people use their Facebook profiles to show their support for the things they care about. If you have any suggestions, please share them with us here: http://on.fb.me/1Yj0NZZ. -Abby
Thank you Evelyn. Kenya should have been the first launch...this tragedy for them happened in April...why just launch Paris first when Kenya's tragedy happened months prior?

Yes, I support there should be a flag every time a massive shooting happens so we can use the flag to support them Please, Good Idea. Facebook should start working on it because yesterday there was an attack in Mali and there is no flag to support. I personally had to make my own by putting it in my picture with paint. Greetings
Terror attacks in Africa is nothing new and happens almost daily. It does not happen often in France which is why it drew so much attention. Find something else about which to complain.
how to change profile picture at siriya suport
